About series subscriptions

Subscriptions are for new books in the series
Subscribe now with 1-Click®
By clicking “Subscribe now with 1-Click®,” you agree to the Kindle Store Terms of Use, and authorize us to charge your default payment method, or other method on file, on the release date, for the lowest price available (or price on the release date for products sold without a pre-order period) on Amazon.co.jp during the pre-order (+ any taxes). Your subscription continues until cancelled at any time from Your Memberships & Subscriptions.

New books delivered as they are released

Learn more
Which books will I get?
Series Subscriptions are for new books in the series. You will not receive any previously released books or the current book as part of this series subscription. In addition, this series subscription does not cover products sold on a per-episode basis.

What will I be charged for each book?
Prices are set as pre-orders are made available. [For products to which the pre-order price guarantee applies, the lowest selling price (including tax) on Amazon.co.jp during the pre-order period will apply.] For products sold without a pre-order period, the price will be the same as the release price. Prices for subsequent issues, and the total amount to be paid by the customer by the time the customer cancels the series subscription or the series is terminated, cannot be confirmed in advance. Pricing for subsequent issues will be announced by email as soon as it is finalized.

How long does a series subscription last?
Series subscriptions continue until you cancel your series subscription, the series ends or we cease to provide the series subscription. You may cancel your pre-order or series subscription at any time.

When will I be charged for each book?
You will not be charged until books are released and ready for download. We will automatically charge your default payment or other payment method on file. The date of invoicing, i.e. the product release date, cannot be confirmed in advance. As soon as it is confirmed, you will receive e-mail notification
You've subscribed to ディストピア~移住先は不貞の島でした~! We will preorder your items within 24 hours of when they become available. When new books are released, we'll charge your default payment method for the lowest price available during the pre-order period.

by 杉野アキユキ (著) Format: Kindle Edition
2.7 out of 5 stars 104
Volume 1 of 14: ディストピア~移住先は不貞の島でした~
See all formats and editions
Sorry, there was a problem loading this page. Try again.
「あの鍋にはワシらのエキスがたっぷりと…」―――優しい妻・愛梨（あいり）と、可愛い娘・真凛（まりん）に囲まれ、それなりに幸せな人生を送っていた成瀬颯太（なるせ・そうた）。愛梨の仕事のために離島に引っ越すことになった3人は優しく穏やかな島人たちから歓迎される。しかし、島の本当の姿は子孫繁栄のためにはなんでもするカルト島で...？殺人・乱交・服従…狂った倫理観が当たり前なこの島で、仲睦まじかった家族は崩壊していく――…

How are ratings calculated?
To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness.
